I used to make these hats that were all the rage with officers and other leaders.

But the main component, the leadership plumeâ€”you can't find those anymore. Not unless you've been hoarding one in a bank vault somewhere."Yo ho!"

Well, I'll be! You've had this gathering dust for a while, huh?

Okay, I'm game: What color do you want?"Well..."
Just so you know, you can't just find leadership plumes anymore. So if you don't already have one, don't waste your time.
